languages.text: "Твои краски столь ярки, сестра Арджента. Ненависть, питающая твои слова и порывы, пылает заревом сверхновой!"
"Your hues are so vivid, Sister Argenta. The hatred that fuels your words and impulses burns like a supernova!"
languages.original_text: "Твои краски столь ярки, сестра Арджента. Ненависть, питающая твои слова и порывы, пылает заревом сверхновой!"

traits.locale_text: "Your hues are so vivid, Sister Argenta. The hatred that fuels your words and impulses burns like a supernova!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your hues are so vivid, Sister Argenta. The hatred that fuels your words and impulses burns like a supernova!"

languages.text: “你的颜色是如此鲜亮，阿洁塔修女。你的恨意激发着你的语言与冲动，仿佛超新星一样熊熊燃烧！”
languages.original_text: "Your hues are so vivid, Sister Argenta. The hatred that fuels your words and impulses burns like a supernova!"

traits.locale_text: “你的颜色是如此鲜亮，阿洁塔修女。你的恨意激发着你的语言与冲动，仿佛超新星一样熊熊燃烧！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Tus colores son muy vívidos, hermana Argenta. ¡El odio que alimenta sus palabras e impulsos arde como una supernova!».
languages.original_text: "Your hues are so vivid, Sister Argenta. The hatred that fuels your words and impulses burns like a supernova!"

traits.locale_text: «Tus colores son muy vívidos, hermana Argenta. ¡El odio que alimenta sus palabras e impulsos arde como una supernova!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ、あなたの色彩はとても鮮やかね。その言葉と、衝動を煽る憎悪は超新星のごとく」
languages.original_text: "Your hues are so vivid, Sister Argenta. The hatred that fuels your words and impulses burns like a supernova!"

traits.locale_text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ、あなたの色彩はとても鮮やかね。その言葉と、衝動を煽る憎悪は超新星のごとく」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Bilder sind so lebendig, Schwester Argenta. Der Hass, der Eure Worte und Impulse befeuert, ist heiß wie eine Supernova."
languages.original_text: "Your hues are so vivid, Sister Argenta. The hatred that fuels your words and impulses burns like a supernova!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Bilder sind so lebendig, Schwester Argenta. Der Hass, der Eure Worte und Impulse befeuert, ist heiß wie eine Supernova."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vos couleurs sont si vives, sœur Argenta. Vos paroles sont nourries d'une telle haine qu'elles rayonnent comme une supernova ! »
languages.original_text: "Your hues are so vivid, Sister Argenta. The hatred that fuels your words and impulses burns like a supernova!"

traits.locale_text: « Vos couleurs sont si vives, sœur Argenta. Vos paroles sont nourries d'une telle haine qu'elles rayonnent comme une supernova ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ne kadar da canlı tonlara sahipsin Rahibe Argenta. Sözcüklerine ve dürtülerine can veren nefret bir süpernova gibi alev alev!"
languages.original_text: "Your hues are so vivid, Sister Argenta. The hatred that fuels your words and impulses burns like a supernova!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne kadar da canlı tonlara sahipsin Rahibe Argenta. Sözcüklerine ve dürtülerine can veren nefret bir süpernova gibi yanıyor!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Your hues are so vivid, Sister Argenta. The hatred that fuels your words and impulses burns like a supernova!"
